Package Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This file holds data members and all the methods which are related to player. This has singleton implementation.

    • addPlayer

      public static boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.Integer noOfArmies)
      This adds a new player in Database.playerlist
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player that is to be added
      noOfArmies - The integer number of armies of the player
      Returns:
      true(If the conditions are satisfied and the player is added) or false(If player already exists or if no name of player is entered)

    • removePlayer

      public static boolean removePlayer​(java.lang.String playerName)
      This removes a player from Database.playerlist
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player to be removed
      Returns:
      true(If the player is removed successfully) or false(The player is absent)

    • allPlayersRemainingArmiesExhausted

      public static boolean allPlayersRemainingArmiesExhausted()
      check if the number of remaining armies that can be placed is equal to zero for every player
      Returns:
      true(If there are no more armies present) or false(If the number of armies to be placed are still not zero)

    • reinforcement

      public static boolean reinforcement​(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph graphObj, Model.CurrentPlayer currentPlayerObj)
      This method check validation of reinforcements and do reinforce.
      Parameters:
      countryName - This is an string which specified by user for reinforcement
      numberOfArmies - This is an integer parameter which specify the number of armies for reinforcement
      graphObj - This is an object which pass the game graph.
      currentPlayerObj - This is an object which is current player of the game.
      Returns:
      true(if runs successfully or false in case it fails any validation)

    • defenderCommandInput

      public static java.lang.Integer defenderCommandInput​(java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesDefenderCanSelect, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      This handles the command entered by the defender to defend his/her country with the number of armies he/she entered.
      Parameters:
      numberOfArmiesDefenderCanSelect - This is the integer value that a defender is allowed to select the number of armies.
      scanner - This is a scanner to take the command written by the defender as an input.
      Returns:
      an integer value that is the number of armies selected by a defender to defend a country.

    • attackAllout

      public static boolean attackAllout​(java.lang.String fromCountry, java.lang.String toCountry, Graph graphObj, Model.CurrentPlayer currentPlayerObj)
      This method attacks until no attack is possible using maximum number of dice to attack/defend.
      Parameters:
      fromCountry - AttackerCountry
      toCountry - DefenderCountry
      graphObj - its graphs instance
      currentPlayerObj - its current player's instance
      Returns:
      true(if runs successfully) or false(in case it fails any validation)

    • attackMoveCommand

      public static java.lang.Integer attackMoveCommand​(java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesDuringLastAttack, java.util.Scanner scanner, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesThatAttackerHave)
      This handles the attackMove command to move the right number of armies from attacker country to defender country when attacker wins the defender country
      Parameters:
      numberOfArmiesDuringLastAttack - This is an integer value that stores number of armies used by the attacker in the las battle and is used for validation.
      scanner - Its a scanner used to take a command as input.
      numberOfArmiesThatAttackerHave - This is an integer value that the attacker have in total in attacker country.
      Returns:
      an integer value that is the number of armies an attacker selected to move to his new owned country.

    • attackMove

      public static boolean attackMove​(Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesToMove)
      This method handles the operation to remove and add the exact number of armies selected by the currentplayer(attacker) to newly owned country.
      Parameters:
      attackerCountry - This is an object for the attacker country.
      defenderCountry - This is an object for the defender country.
      numberOfArmiesToMove - an integer value selected by the attacker to move between countries.
      Returns:
      true(if runs successfully) or false(if fails some validation)

    • attackCountry

      public static boolean attackCountry​(java.lang.String fromCountry, java.lang.String toCountry, java.lang.Integer numDice, Graph graphObj, Model.CurrentPlayer currentPlayerObj)
      This method attacks from attackerCountry to defenderCountry with number of armies selected.
      Parameters:
      fromCountry - This is a attackerCountry.
      toCountry - This is a defenderCountry.
      numDice - Its an integer value for number of armies attacker choose to attack with.
      graphObj - This is the object of the Graph.
      currentPlayerObj - This is the object of currentPlayer.
      Returns:
      true(if runs successfully) or false(in case it fails any validation)

    • getRandomNumber

      public static int getRandomNumber​(java.lang.Integer maxDice)
      This gives a random number whenever dice is rolled upto maxDice.
      Parameters:
      maxDice - its an integer value upto which we want a number.
      Returns:
      a random number

    • battle

      public static boolean battle​(Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry, java.lang.Integer attackerArmies, java.lang.Integer defenderArmies, Player attacker, Player defender)
      This method manages the battle between attackerCountry and defenderCountry and declares whoever wins the battle.
      Parameters:
      attackerCountry - object of the country that attacks the other country.
      defenderCountry - object of the country that is attacked.
      attackerArmies - Integer value, number of armies selected by attacker to attack.
      defenderArmies - Integer value, number of armies selected by defender to defend.
      attacker - player on attacker object
      defender - player on defence object
      Returns:
      true(if runs successfully)

    • fortify

      public static boolean fortify​(java.lang.String fromCname, java.lang.String toCountryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph gameGraph)
      This allows a player to move any number of armies from his owned country to any of his owned neighbor country, leaving behind at least 1 army unit.
      Parameters:
      fromCname - The name of the country from where the armies are to be moved
      toCountryName - The name of the country to which the armies are to be moved
      numberOfArmies - The total number of armies to be moved
      gameGraph - This is an object of the class Graph
      Returns:
      true(If all the conditions are satisfied and the desired country is fortified) or false(If the countries specified are absent or it does not fulfill the requirements)

    • getNumberOfCountriesOwned

      public java.lang.Integer getNumberOfCountriesOwned​(java.lang.String playerName, Graph gameGraph)
      This method returns the total number of countries owned by the players.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player
      gameGraph - This is an object of the class Graph
      Returns:
      An integer value that is equal to the total number of countries owned by the player

    • getTotalArmiesOwnedByPlayer

      public java.lang.Integer getTotalArmiesOwnedByPlayer​(Graph gameGraph)
      This method returns the total number of armies owned by the players.
      Parameters:
      gameGraph - It is an object of the class Graph
      Returns:
      integer value that is equal to the total number of armies owned by the player
